summary: This mod adds a master dungeon in the west of Dawnstar. You will probably die.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][color=#ff0000]Challenge:
[/color][/b][/u]
This mod adds a master dungeon in the west of Dawnstar.

Accept the challenge and free the [color=#ff0000]Quicksilvermine in Dawnstar[/color] from the control of the Ebonyheartclan. 

No DLC required. 

LVL [color=#ff0000]50+[/color] (Leveled)

[i]You can keep the armours and weapons if you beat it.[/i]

[u][b][color=#ff0000]Members of the Clan:[/color][/b][/u]

The Boss (Uses fire/healing Magic and a onehanded sword with fire damage, also shouts)

The Tank (Uses a twohanded axe with fire damage)

The Mage (Uses fire/healing magic)

The Knight (Uses a onehanded mace with fire damage and a shield)

The Marksman (Uses a bow with fire damage and a dagger with fire damage)

[i]All of them have a lot of Health,Stamina and Magicka.[/i]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]Ranks:[/color][/u][/b]

[i]Difficulty has to be Adept or higher.[/i]

Rank 1: No Cheats/OP-Mods, No Followers, No Sneaking, No Potions, No Smithing/Enchanting (WTF)

Rank 2: No Cheats/OP-Mods, No Followers, No Sneaking, No Potions (Impossible)

Rank 3: No Cheats/OP-Mods, No Followers, No Sneaking (Unbelievable)

Rank 4: No Cheats/OP-Mods, No Followers. (Amazing)

Rank 5: No Cheats/OP-Mods. (Nice)

[i]Let me know what you got.[/i]

[b][color=#ff0000][u]How to do it:[/u][/color][/b]

[youtube]FDfbFTnxR9M[/youtube]

[i]I got Rank 5 without smithing/enchanting skills.[/i]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]Steam:[/color][/u][/b]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=528028318]Steam Version[/url]
author: Katoarijikashi
